title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync
description: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), overwriting the exported jar on the 2nd attempt results in an out of sync message.
OB: The out of sync message is triggered when overwriting the exported jar file in the same directory after exporting the directory (project).
EB: The jar file should be overwritten without triggering an out of sync message.
SR:
1. Open the directory (project) you want to export.
2. Export the directory as a jar file and save it in the same directory.
3. After the export is completed, attempt to overwrite the exported jar file in the same directory.
4. Verify if an out of sync message is displayed.
